ADD-LANE-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add new duplicate lane.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to select the lane you want to duplicate.
New lane will be added next to the selected lane.
CROSSWALK-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add crosswalks on roads.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add a crosswalk.
Drag the control point to move the crosswalk.
Change values from the inspector.
LANE-DIRECTION-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Adjust Lane Direction for traffic.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to select the lane
Change values from the inspector.
LANE-HEIGHT-DESCRIPTION:
Edit lane height for sidewalk/curb.
Use LEFT CLICK to select a lane.
Modify lane properties from Inspector.
LANE-MARKING-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to add/edit Lane Markings.
Select the road and move your cursor over the Lane Reference Line
Use `SHIFT` + `LEFT CLICK` to add a new `Lane Marking Node`
Modify the properties of the new `Lane Marking Node` from the inspector as needed.
LANE-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to edit type, material & other lane properties.
Use LEFT CLICK to select a lane.
Modify lane properties from Inspector.
LANE-TYPE-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Change the type of lane.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to select the lane.
Change the lane type from the inspector.
LANE-WIDTH-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to edit width of lane.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to insert a new node.
Use LEFT CLICK to select a node and edit.
Drag selected node to change distance value
Change node properties from the inspector.
MANEUVER-DESCRIPTION:
Edit Junction maneuvers
Drag maneuver control points.
PROP-CURVE-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Select a Prop from Project Browser.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add Props as curve/line in environment.
PROP-POINT-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Select a Prop from Project Browser.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add Props in environment.
PROP-POLYGON-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Select a Prop from Project Browser.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add Props in polygon in environment.
ROAD-CIRCLE-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to create circular road.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK then drag to control circle size.
Use Road Tool to modify shape of the circle
ROAD-DIVIDER-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to divide road in multiple segments.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to divide a road.
ROAD-ELEVATION-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to edit road elevation.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to a node.
ROAD-GEOMETRY-DESCRIPTION:
Tool to create road geometries.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to create control points.
LEFT CLICK control points to drag and reshape road.
LEFT CLICK to select node (Red Highlights at start/end of road).
Roads can be linked/joined by selecting 2 nodes
ROAD-OBJECT-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add objects & props in the environment.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add an object in the environment.
Drag the control point to move the object.
Change values from the inspector.
ROAD-SIGN-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add Road Sign.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add a sign in the environment.
Drag the control point to move the sign.
Change values from the inspector.
TEXT-MARKING-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add text markings roads.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add a marking.
TRAFFIC-SIGNAL-TOOL-DESCRIPTION: Add Traffic Signals on junctions.
VEHICLE-TOOL-DESCRIPTION:
Add Vehicle actors.
Use SHIFT + LEFT CLICK to add drop an actor in scene.
Drag the control point to move the actor.
Change values from the inspector.
